about_the_game:
Kaito Shiromae—a young man with a gift for hacking.

Despite being a student, he manages to break through the ultimate security challenge, gaining root access to Central-AI—a system that supervises countless AIs around the world.

In this day and age, the majority of human infrastructure is managed by AI. With his new power, Kaito is capable of anything, so he gives Central-AI the following command:

“Help me, Kaito Shiromae, meet a girl who’s crazy in love with me! A kind girl, with big, pretty eyes, who’ll pamper me!”

However, he is met with the response:

“No candidate found. 0 matching results.”

Kaito goes to bed dejected, but after considering how to execute his command, Central-AI activates a factory in the dead of night and manufactures a robot to satisfy his request.

Several days later, a girl seemingly tailor-made to be his ideal woman—Tsukuyomi—appears at his doorstep.

Decide how the story plays out by making choices at key story moments in this romance comedy visual novel!

Features:

  • A Romance Comedy Visual Novel
  • Make Choices to Change the Story
  • Quick Save/Load Feature
  • Skip Feature
detailed_description:
Kaito Shiromae—a young man with a gift for hacking.

Despite being a student, he manages to break through the ultimate security challenge, gaining root access to Central-AI—a system that supervises countless AIs around the world.

In this day and age, the majority of human infrastructure is managed by AI. With his new power, Kaito is capable of anything, so he gives Central-AI the following command:

“Help me, Kaito Shiromae, meet a girl who’s crazy in love with me! A kind girl, with big, pretty eyes, who’ll pamper me!”

However, he is met with the response:

“No candidate found. 0 matching results.”

Kaito goes to bed dejected, but after considering how to execute his command, Central-AI activates a factory in the dead of night and manufactures a robot to satisfy his request.

Several days later, a girl seemingly tailor-made to be his ideal woman—Tsukuyomi—appears at his doorstep.

Decide how the story plays out by making choices at key story moments in this romance comedy visual novel!

Features:

  • A Romance Comedy Visual Novel
  • Make Choices to Change the Story
  • Quick Save/Load Feature
  • Skip Feature

name: Hacking The Moon to Find My Goddess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 11/10/8
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: Kaito Shiromae is a young man with a gift for hacking, but when he hacks into Central-AI—a system that supervises countless AIs around the world—and asks it to find him his soulmate, he ends up with an unexpected surprise.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
